issue.title: [Integration] Remove Spark Integration patch that not needed anymore
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7502](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7502). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Apache Spark master has been updated to work with Arrow 0.15.1 after the binary protocol  change and patching Spark master is no longer necessary to build with current Arrow, so the previous patch can be removed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7502?focusedCommentId=17009961) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6129
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6129>
